eLabel.text: Uyelik Aktif Olmasini Istiyorsaniz Bilgileri Dogru Girmelisiniz

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 2), size = (600, 45), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (620, 0), size = (270, 45), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 2), # index 2 is the state MultiContentEntryProgress(pos = (900, 10), size = (200, 25), percent = -3), # index 3 should be progress MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1100, 5), size = (140, 45), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 4), # index 4 is the percentage ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",28),gFont("Regular",22)], "itemHeight": 45 }
